description: Astronomers have directly observed a black hole twisting spacetime for the first time, confirming Einstein’s long-standing prediction. The effect was detected during a violent stellar destruction event, where repeating X-ray and radio signals revealed a slow cosmic wobble. The discovery provides new insight into black hole spin, jets, and extreme gravity.
title: Astronomers Observe Black Hole Twisting Spacetime for the First Time, Confirming Einstein’s Theory

description: Four More Shots Please is back with its final season, where the show will explore the friendships between four girls and their struggles through professional and personal life.
title: Four More Shots Please Final Season Out on Prime Video: Know Everything About This Show For One Last Time

description: Godday Godday Chaa 2 is a well-received Punjabi film that blends entertainment with meaningful social commentary. Featuring Ammy Virk and Tania, the sequel builds on the success of the first part and stands out for its clean humour, relatable characters, and strong performances.
title: Godday Godday Chaa 2 Now Streaming Online: A Powerful Punjabi Comedy with Social Satire

description: Astronomers using NASA’s Hubble Space Telescope have witnessed rare collisions between rocky bodies in the Fomalhaut system. The glowing debris clouds created by these impacts offer a unique glimpse into how planets form and highlight challenges in identifying true exoplanets.
title: Hubble Captures Rare Collision in Nearby Planetary System, Revealing Violent Planet Formation

description: Mrs. Deshpande stands out as a thoughtful drama series that blends emotional depth with social relevance. With its strong female protagonist and mature storytelling, the show has attracted attention for its realistic portrayal of everyday struggles and quiet empowerment, making it a notable addition to contemporary Indian OTT content.Mrs Deshpande is a series of psychological crime thrillers, which is based on the women's struggles and their recognition as independent women. The plot tells about the copy cat murderer of Mrs Deshpande wherein the crimes are going on with the same modus operandi as she has.
title: Mrs. Deshpande Now Streaming Online: A Powerful Drama Exploring Identity, Marriage and Strength

description: NASA’s PUNCH mission released images tracking solar eruptions from the Sun’s corona into interplanetary space. The data reveals CMEs and solar wind dynamics and supports better space weather forecasting for Earth and beyond.
title: NASA’s PUNCH Mission Provides First Continuous Views of Solar Eruptions Across Space

description: Written and directed by Arun Prabhu Purushothaman, Pharma is a Malayalam drama series that has finally made its way to the digital screens. It is now streaming on JioHotstar.
title: Pharma Streaming Now on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know About This Thought-Provoking Drama Online

description: After ten years of experiments, physicists found no evidence for the sterile neutrino, once thought to explain unusual neutrino behaviour. The MicroBooNE experiment at Fermilab analysed neutrinos from two beams and ruled out the particle with 95% certainty. The findings narrow the search for new physics and inform future experiments like DUNE.
title: Scientists Rule Out Elusive Sterile Neutrino After 10-Year Hunt, Shaking Particle Physics

description: A SpaceX Starlink satellite is tumbling toward Earth after an orbital anomaly caused partial breakup and loss of contact. The company says the spacecraft will safely burn up during reentry, while the incident highlights increasing space safety concerns as satellite numbers continue to grow rapidly.
title: Starlink Satellite Breaks Apart in Orbit, Begins Uncontrolled Fall Toward Earth After SpaceX Anomaly

description: Adobe and Runway have announced a multi-year partnership that brings Runway’s latest AI video models to Adobe Firefly ahead of other platforms. Adobe will also act as Runway’s preferred creativity API partner. Firefly users will get early access to new models, starting with Gen-4.5, while both companies plan to co-develop new AI video tools for professional creators.
title: Adobe Partners With Runway to Offer Firefly Users Early Access to Video Generation Models

description: Smartphones with 1TB storage are gaining relevance in India as users demand more space for high-resolution photos, videos, games, and offline content. In 2025, only a few ultra-flagship phones offer this option, including the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy Z Fold 7, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone Air. These handsets pair massive storage with top-tier processors, advanced cameras, premium designs, and long software support, targeting creators and other interested buyers seeking a no-compromise smartphone experience.
title: Best Smartphones With 1TB Storage in India: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, iPhone 17 Pro Max and More

description: Honor Magic V6 is reportedly in development, as a tipster has shared the key specifications of the purported foldable handset. The smartphone is expected to succeed this year's Magic V5, which was unveiled in select global markets in August. The rumoured Magic V6 is tipped to be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, which is currently Qualcomm's most powerful SoC. Moreover, the leaker claims that the phone will pack the largest battery to ever feature on a foldable smartphone.
title: Honor Magic V6 Tipped to Launch With 7,200mAh Dual-Cell Battery, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC

description: Netflix Games and FIFA have announced a new FIFA football simulation game tied in with the 2026 FIFA World Cup. The football title will reimagine the franchise and will be available to Netflix members for free on mobile devices and select TVs. The new FIFA game is being developed and published by Delphi Interactive.
title: New FIFA Game to Launch on Netflix Games in Time for FIFA World Cup Next Year

description: Instagram is one of the most widely used social media platforms today. Beyond the everyday interactions, Instagram has steadily been adding a range of features. Many of these tools, however, are not prominently highlighted within the app, which means they often go unnoticed. Here are five hidden features you might not know exist and why they’re worth using.
title: Top Instagram Features You May Not Know About: Quiet Mode, Auto-Scroll for Reels, and More

description: Union Bank of India lets its customers check their savings and current account balances via different online and offline methods. As more financial institutions adopt modern banking methods, customers have also started gravitating towards convenient ways of accessing banking services. For example, the Union Bank of India allows customers to check their account balance through internet banking, WhatsApp banking, mobile app, and SMS and missed call banking. Dubbed Vyom, its mobile banking app is available on Android and iOS.
title: Union Bank of India Balance Check Number: How to Check Union Bank of India Account Balance Online Using Different Methods

description: A WhatsApp 'GhostPairing' account takeover scam has been uncovered that abuses the app’s device-linking feature. Attackers trick users into linking to a malicious device by posing as trusted contacts and using fake Facebook-style links. Victims unknowingly approve a pairing code, granting attackers full WhatsApp Web access without password theft or SIM swaps. First seen in Czechia, the scam spreads through contacts and groups. Users are advised to check linked devices, stay cautious of pairing requests, and enable two-step verification.
title: WhatsApp GhostPairing Scam Reportedly Lets Hackers Take Over Accounts Without Authentication

description: YouTube has permanently banned two channels for posting misleading AI-generated movie trailers. One of them, Screen Culture from India, and Georgia-based KH Studio were accused of using synthetic visuals to pass off fake trailers as real. After earlier ad suspensions and repeat policy violations, YouTube removed both channels, citing deceptive content and failure to properly disclose AI-generated material.
title: YouTube Bans Popular Indian Channel for Making Misleading AI-Generated Movie Trailers

description: Dominic and The Ladies’ Purse is a Malayalam comedy thriller film that has finally made its way to the digital screens.
title: Dominic and The Ladies Purse Out on OTT: Know Everything About Streaming, Plot, Cast, and More

description: OpenAI has updated its Model Spec to put teenager safety at the top of ChatGPT’s priorities. The changes guide how the chatbot responds to users aged 13 to 17, stressing age-appropriate tone, transparency, and encouragement of real-world support. OpenAI is also rolling out an age-detection system, as other AI firms like Anthropic explore similar safeguards.
title: OpenAI Updates AI Guidelines to Prioritise Teen Safety Over Other Goals

description: Redmi Note 15 5G is scheduled to launch in India on January 6, 2026. Leading up to its unveiling in the country, the smartphone maker has teased various specifications of the Note 15 5G. While the tech firm is yet to reveal the pricing in India of the handset, the same has surfaced online. Additionally, the dedicated microsite for the phone on an e-commerce platform has been updated to reveal more details, including its display features and ingress protection (IP) rating.
title: Redmi Note 15 5G Price in India, Storage Configurations Tipped Ahead of January 6 Launch

description: Sony has announced its year-end Holiday sale in India, bringing discounts to PS5 accessories and games. There's no discount on PS5 consoles, but DualSense controllers, Pulse wireless headsets and earbuds, PS VR2, and PlayStation Portal remote player get big discounts. Check out the accessories and games discounted during the sale.
title: Sony Announces Year-End Holiday Sale in India on PS5 Accessories, Games

description: Oppo Reno 15 Pro and Reno 15 Pro Max are expected to use the MediaTek Dimensity 8450 chipset, paired with 12GB RAM and Android 16, according to their Geekbench listings. Benchmark scores for both models have also surfaced. Oppo has not confirmed launch timelines yet, but the listings suggest a wider rollout may be approaching, with a Pro Mini variant also tipped for select markets.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Global Variant Reportedly Surface on Geekbench Alongside Reno 15 Pro Max

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra is rumoured to be launched in China soon as the top-of-the-line model in the latest flagship Xiaomi 17 series. Ahead of its anticipated debut, details about its battery capacity, charging speed, and colourways have been leaked. According to a tipster, the handset will pack a 6,800mAh battery and support both wired and wireless fast charging. The Xiaomi 17 Ultra is tipped to be available in four colourways, including black and white options.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Battery, Charging Specifications and Colourways Tipped Ahead of Launch

description: Crypto markets traded cautiously on Friday as Bitcoin and Ethereum remained range-bound amid tight liquidity and mixed global signals. Investors stayed defensive ahead of key central bank decisions, while altcoins lagged due to weak volumes and limited risk appetite. Analysts said macro uncertainty and uneven liquidity continue to shape near-term price action.
title: Crypto Traders Remain Cautious Amidst Tight Liquidity and Mixed Global Cues

description: Starring Mouli Tanuj Prasanth and Shivani Nagarama in the lead roles, Little Hearts is a coming-of-age romance drama film that is currently streaming on Netflix in multiple languages.
title: Little Hearts Streaming Now on Netflix: Know Everything About Plot, Cast, and More

description: Vivo X200T is expected to be launched in India early next year as a new addition to the company’s X lineup. While the tech firm is yet to confirm the debut of the handset, various details, including its key specifications, features, and launch timeline, have been surfacing online for a while. Now, a tipster has shared additional details about the phone, like its chipset, rear camera configuration, and charging speed.
title: Vivo X200T Key Specifications Tipped Ahead of India Launch; Could Feature Three 50-Megapixel Cameras

description: Apple’s first foldable iPhone is expected to be announced in the second half of 2026, but production challenges could delay wider availability until 2027, according to analyst Ming-Chi Kuo. He says early yield issues and ramp-up difficulties may lead to limited supply through the end of 2026. Apple still plans to launch the device to enter the foldable market, even with low initial volumes. The foldable iPhone is expected to be expensive and feature a book-style design.
title: Apple's Foldable iPhone Shipments May Slip to 2027 Despite 2026 Launch, Analyst Says

description: Google has announced the Pixel Upgrade Program in India. It is a new ownership programme to help users gain access to the the latest Pixel phones, such as the Pixel 10 series, with greater convenience. Under the Pixel Upgrade Program, buyers in India can purchase a Pixel phone on a monthly instalment plan with flexible payment options. They can also upgrade to the newer Pixel devices with an assured buyback for the existing Pixel phone.
title: Google Pixel Upgrade Program Launched in India With Assured Buyback of Pixel 10 Series Models

description: Naughty Dog employees are reportedly working overtime since late October to finish a demo for Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet for an internal review by Sony. The studio is reportedly planning to launch the sci-fi action-adventure game in mid-2017.
title: Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet Targeting Mid-2027 Launch as Naughty Dog Orders Overtime: Report

description: Meta is reportedly developing three new AI models under its Superintelligence Labs division. These include an image and video generation model to rival tools from Google and OpenAI, a coding-focused text model, and advanced world models. The push signals Meta’s intent to compete more aggressively in both consumer-facing AI features and long-term research tied to robotics and AGI.
title: Meta Reportedly Building  Three New Generative AI Models With Focus on Image and Video Generation

description: Oppo Pad Air 2 was launched in China in 2023. It has been over two years since the company refreshed its Pad Air lineup. Now, the tech firm has announced that it will launch the Oppo Pad Air 5 in the country later this month. Along with the launch date, the company has also revealed the storage options and colourways of the upcoming Pad Air 5. The new tablet is teased to feature a single rear camera and stylus support. It will be available for purchase in China via the Oppo online store.
title: Oppo Pad Air 5 Launch Date, Colourways, Storage Options Revealed: See Expected Specifications, Features

description: China-based consumer household appliance brand Dreame Technology is gearing up to launch its first smartphone. Its specifications have now allegedly surfaced via a certification listing. The smartphone, dubbed Dreame E1, will allegedly sport a 6.67-inch AMOLED screen. The handset is said to pack a triple rear camera setup, headlined by a 108-megapixel main sensor. It is expected to deliver more than 54 hours of usage on a single charge and has been categorised as ‘Class A’ in terms of energy efficiency.
title: Dreame E1 Phone to Reportedly Debut With 108-Megapixel Camera and 5,000mAh Battery: Expected Specifications

description: Google has added a new video verification tool to Gemini that helps users check whether a clip was created or edited using Google’s AI models. Users can upload a video and ask Gemini to analyse it for SynthID watermarks. The feature follows a similar image tool launched last month and aims to make it easier to spot AI-generated or edited videos.
title: Google Brings SynthID-Powered Deepfake AI Video Detection Tool to Gemini App

description: Oppo may launch the Reno 15 Pro Mini as the first compact smartphone in the Reno series, according to a new report. The phone is expected to feature a 6.32-inch AMOLED display, slim bezels, a glass back, and IP66, IP67, and IP69 ratings. It may use the Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset in global markets, including India, and support up to 80W fast charging. The Reno 15 Pro Mini has not launched in China yet, hinting at a limited global release.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Mini Key Features Surface Online; Could Launch in Global Markets Soon

description: Raju Weds Rambai stands out as an entertaining Telugu film that captures the charm of romance blended with humor and family drama. With its relatable storyline and engaging narrative, the movie appeals to viewers looking for a wholesome cinematic experience and adds another refreshing title to contemporary Telugu cinema.
title: Raju Weds Rambai Now Streaming Online: What You Need to Know

description: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G and Realme 16 Pro 5G will be launched in India early next month, the company announced on Friday.
title: Realme 16 Pro Series India Launch Date Announced: See Expected Specifications, Features

description: The Fifty has gained attention for its large-scale format and emphasis on strategic gameplay over simple physical competition. Audiences and reality show enthusiasts have responded positively to its suspense-driven structure, frequent twists, and strong production value. The show is often compared to popular international survival and strategy-based reality series, making it a notable addition to the competitive reality television landscape.
title: The Fifty OTT Release: When and Where to Watch This High-Stakes Reality Show Online?

description: NotebookLM is getting various new upgrades. On Thursday, Google Labs, the Mountain View-based company’s platform for launching experimental AI features, announced that NotebookLM is getting the Data Tables upgrade. This will allow users to organise information into a data table within the AI-powered research platform. These files can later be exported to Google Sheets, where users will be able to edit information. The feature is currently available to all Google AI Pro and Google AI Ultra subscribers. However, the company plans to make it available to all users in the coming weeks.
title: Google's NotebookLM Updated With Data Tables, Export Support for Notes and Reports

description: Samsung’s Galaxy Z Fold 8, expected to launch in 2026, is tipped to receive camera upgrades, according to a new report. The foldable is said to retain the 200-megapixel main camera and 10-megapixel selfie sensors from the Galaxy Z Fold 7, while upgrading the telephoto camera to 12 megapixels with 3x optical zoom and introducing a 50-megapixel ultrawide sensor. These early details may change, but suggest Samsung is bringing more Galaxy S-series camera technology to its premium foldables.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 8 Will Reportedly Launch With Telephoto and Ultrawide Camera Upgrades

description: Instagram on Friday announced a limit for content discovery on its platform. It is enforcing a restriction on the number of hashtags that can be attached to a Reel or post. As per the Meta-owned social media giant, fewer and targeted hashtags can help creators much more in content discovery and performance, as opposed to spamming posts with generic and many hashtags. This move is aimed at preventing misuse of the functionality.
title: Instagram Announces a Five-Hashtag Limit for Reels and Posts to Improve Content Discovery

description: Samsung Foundry on Friday officially announced Exynos 2600 as its latest flagship-grade mobile SoC, part of its in-house silicon efforts. The new processor is touted as not only Samsung’s but the world’s first built on a 2nm process with advanced GAA (Gate-All-Around) technology. Exynos. It is claimed to combine CPU, GPU, and NPU into a single compact chip for enhanced artificial intelligence (AI) and gaming experiences. Exynos 2600 is expected to debut early next year, most likely in the upcoming Galaxy S26 series.
title: Samsung Announces Exynos 2600 as World’s First 2nm Node Chipset for Flagship Galaxy Devices
